2.12. System Module – Loaded kernel modules¶

The list of system modules is accessible via windows.system.modules

Note

See sample windows.system

2.12.1. SystemModule¶

class windows.winobject.system_module.SystemModule[source]¶

Bases: BaseSystemModule, _SYSTEM_MODULE64

A system module.

Note

inherit from SYSTEM_MODULE[32/64] based on the current process bitness

Flags¶

Structure/Union member

Structure/Union member

Structure/Union member

Structure/Union member

Structure/Union member

property name¶

The name of the system module: alias for ImageName

class windows.winobject.system_module.SystemModuleWow64[source]¶

2.12.3. BaseSystemModule¶

class windows.winobject.system_module.BaseSystemModule[source]¶

[ABSTRACT] A common base class for all system modules

property name¶
